ygData.subject: Re: Bard list gettogether
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know if the list is slow or what, but so far I ve had a rather underwhelming response to the idea. I d like to see at least 20+ people committed to
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Oct 08/99, RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> Count me in. I would love to post a screenshot of the mass high dive
> of death as a screen saver at work ;)

I don't know if the list is slow or what, but so far I've had a rather
underwhelming response to the idea. I'd like to see at least 20+ people
committed to it before taking it further, otherwise it will be rather a
non-event.
